pr_title: MINOR: distinguish between missing source topics and internal assignment errors

timeline.message: add new ASSIGNMENT_ERROR error code, differentiate MissingSourceTopic from generic TaskAssignmentException
add new ASSIGNMENT_ERROR error code, differentiate MissingSourceTopic from generic TaskAssignmentException

timeline.body:
Maybe we shouldn't say "error" when it's not an error. I'm just imagining the mailing list questions that will start pouring in...

```suggestion
            log.info("Received version probing code {}", AssignorError.VERSION_PROBING);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Maybe we shouldn't say "error" when it's not an error. I'm just imagining the mailing list questions that will start pouring in...

Suggested change
log.info("Received error code {}", AssignorError.VERSION_PROBING);
log.info("Received version probing code {}", AssignorError.VERSION_PROBING);
timeline.author: vvcephei

timeline.message: rebase and fix test broken by collision with recent PR

Avoid using the word "error" in context of version probing

Co-authored-by: John Roesler <vvcephei@users.noreply.github.com>
